channel.title: Help making backup CD
channel.description: I just borrowed Star Wars Empire At War and The Sims 2 and i need help on playing them without the disk. I made an image on alcohol 120 but know i'm lost.

item.description:

yeh mate ive did it with other games…wtf isnt it working then?

You don’t know what the hell your talking about do you…

Read full topic

item.title: Help making backup CD
item.dc:creator: @thealmighty thealmighty
item.description:
@thealmighty wrote:

Put the disk in you want to copy then go to my computer right click on the drive select open highlight all paste into my documents or wherever then change the path of your Sims2.exe or Starwars.exe to C:\Documents and Settings*\My Documents\TheSims2.exe or C:\Documents and Settings*\My Documents\Starwars.exe then it should run from that folder instead of running from a disk.

-EDIT- Or maybe this might work http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5912.0.html

Read full topic
